page.title: 14PROFILE cont.
page.content:
NAME:Tommy AGE:40
Unemployed for seven years,due to illness.He gets up at 7:30 am,visits his allotment where he has four greyhound dogs.They are called Mick,Kizzy,Edna and Snoopy.He gives them bread,milk and bonios for breakfast.When he returns home he reads any letters which have arrived,and at about 10.00 am he goes to the shop to buy twenty cigarettes and the Stanley News. He likes chips,kippers and eggs for dinner,he also enjoys cakes ice-cream and pop. After tea he goes back to the allotment to feed the dogs their main meal.He then watches television,reads newspapers or plays monopoly with us.My dad goes to bed at 12.30 am.
